akn:content.akn:p:
§ 470aaa–8. Confidentiality Information concerning the nature and specific location of a paleontological resource shall be exempt from disclosure under section 552 of title 5 and any other law unless the Secretary determines that disclosure would—(1) further the purposes of this chapter;
(2) not create risk of harm to or theft or destruction of the resource or the site containing the resource; and
(3) be in accordance with other applicable laws.
(Pub. L. 111–11, title VI, § 6309, Mar. 30, 2009, 123 Stat. 1176.)
(1) further the purposes of this chapter;
(2) not create risk of harm to or theft or destruction of the resource or the site containing the resource; and
(3) be in accordance with other applicable laws.
